mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* passgcommon.xml : passg.common.insertPaGoodsKindsList by PaSsgCommonController */ TPAGOODSKINDS ( PA_GROUP_CODE , PA_LMSD_KEY , PA_LGROUP , PA_MGROUP , PA_SGROUP , PA_DGROUP , PA_LGROUP_NAME , PA_MGROUP_NAME , PA_SGROUP_NAME , PA_DGROUP_NAME , USE_YN , MEDICAL_YN , CHILD_CERT_YN , ELECTRIC_CERT_YN , LIFE_CERT_YN , REMARK , HEALTH_YN , FOOD_YN , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE ) SELECT TGKM.PA_GROUP_CODE , TGKM.PA_LMSD_KEY , TGKM.PA_LGROUP , TGKM.PA_MGROUP , TGKM.PA_SGROUP , TGKM.PA_DGROUP , TGKM.PA_LGROUP_NAME , TGKM.PA_MGROUP_NAME , TGKM.PA_SGROUP_NAME , TGKM.PA_DGROUP_NAME , '1' , NVL(TGKM.MEDICAL_YN,0) , NVL(TGKM.CHILD_CERT_YN,0) , NVL(TGKM.ELECTRIC_CERT_YN,0) , NVL(TGKM.LIFE_CERT_YN,0) , TGKM.REMARK , NVL(TGKM.HEALTH_YN,0) , NVL(TGKM.FOOD_YN,0) , #{insertId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{insertDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{insertId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{insertDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM TPAGOODSKINDSMOMENT TGKM WHERE TGKM.PA_GROUP_CODE = #{paGroupCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TPAGOODSKINDS TGK WHERE TGK.PA_GROUP_CODE = TGKM.PA_GROUP_CODE AND TGK.PA_LMSD_KEY = TGKM.PA_LMSD_KEY )
mapper.select: SELECT /* passgcommon.xml : passg.common.selectSsgStandardCategoryList by PaSsgCommonController-entpShipUpdate */ PA_LMSD_KEY FROM TPAGOODSKINDS A WHERE A.PA_GROUP_CODE = '10'

SELECT /* passgcommon.xml : passg.passgcommon.selectEntpSlipCost */ SC.PA_CODE , SC.SHPPCST_APL_UNIT_CD , SC.SHPPCST_PLCY_DIV_CD , SC.COLLECT_YN , SC.SHIP_COST_BASE_AMT , SC.SHIP_COST FROM TPASSGSHIPCOST SC WHERE SC.PA_SHIP_POLICY_NO IS NULL

SELECT /* passgcommon.xml : passg.passgcommon.selectSlipInsertList by PaSsgCommonController-returnSlipInsert */ EU.POST_NO AS POST_NO , EU.STD_ROAD_POST_ADDR1 , EU.STD_ROAD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.STD_POST_ADDR1 , EU.STD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.ENTP_CODE , EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ , EU.ENTP_MAN_GB , DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1, NULL, EU.ENTP_MAN_DDD || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2, EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3) AS ENTP_MAN_HP , EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 , EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3 FROM TENTPUSER EU , TENTERPRISE EP WHERE EU.ENTP_CODE = EP.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_CODE = #{entpCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = #{entpManSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM TPAENTPSLIP PL WHERE EU.ENTP_CODE = PL.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = PL.ENTP_MAN_SEQ AND PL.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT /* passgcommon.xml : passg.passgcommon.selectEntpSlipUpdateList by PaSsgCommonController-entpShipUpdate */ EU.POST_NO AS POST_NO , EU.STD_ROAD_POST_ADDR1 , EU.STD_ROAD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.STD_POST_ADDR1 , EU.STD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.ENTP_CODE , EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ , EU.ENTP_MAN_GB , DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1, NULL, EU.ENTP_MAN_DDD || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2, EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3) AS ENTP_MAN_HP , EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 , EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3 , PL.PA_CODE , PL.PA_ADDR_SEQ FROM TENTPUSER EU , TENTERPRISE EP , TPAENTPSLIP PL WHERE EU.ENTP_CODE = EP.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_CODE = PL.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = PL.ENTP_MAN_SEQ AND PL.PA_CODE IN ('A1','A2') AND PL.PA_ADDR_GB IN ('20','30') AND PL.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1' AND PL.PA_ADDR_SEQ IS NOT NULL

SELECT /* passgcommon.xml : passg.passgcommon.selectEntpSlipUpdateList by PaSsgSellerService */ EU.POST_NO AS POST_NO , EU.STD_ROAD_POST_ADDR1 , EU.STD_ROAD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.STD_POST_ADDR1 , EU.STD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.ENTP_CODE , EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ , EU.ENTP_MAN_GB , DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1, NULL, EU.ENTP_MAN_DDD || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2, EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3) AS ENTP_MAN_HP , EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 , EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3 , PL.PA_CODE , PL.PA_ADDR_SEQ FROM TENTPUSER EU , TENTERPRISE EP , TPAENTPSLIP PL WHERE EU.ENTP_CODE = EP.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_CODE = PL.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = PL.ENTP_MAN_SEQ AND PL.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PL.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1' AND PL.PA_ADDR_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND PL.ENTP_CODE = #{entpCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PL.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = #{entpManSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /* passgcommon.xml : passg.passgcommon.selectGoodsKindsList by PaSsgCommonController-recommendCategoryList */ A.PA_LMSD_KEY FROM TPAGOODSKINDS A WHERE A.PA_GROUP_CODE = '10' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TPASSGRECOMMENDDISPLAY B WHERE A.PA_LMSD_KEY = B.STD_CTG_DCLS_ID ) ORDER BY A.PA_LMSD_KEY

SELECT /* passgcommon.xml : passg.passgcommon.selectSsgGoodsCertList by PaSsgCommonController-authenticationinfoList */ A.PA_LMSD_KEY FROM TPAGOODSKINDS A WHERE A.PA_GROUP_CODE = '10' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TPASSGGOODSCERTIFICATION B WHERE A.PA_LMSD_KEY = B.STD_CTG_ID ) ORDER BY A.PA_LMSD_KEY
SELECT /* passgcommon.xml : passg.passgcommon.selectPaSsgSettlementExists */ COUNT(1) FROM TPASSGSETTLEMENT PS WHERE PS.CRITN_DT = #{salesDateToString, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
